Reason:

Unhandled event loop exception
Reason:
Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.NullPointerException)
*** SWT nested exception
Reason:
java.lang.NullPointerException

How to reproduce:
- Use I20041102 on Linux GTK
- Fresh workspace.
- Download org.eclipse.swt.tests
- Open up file 'AllTests.java'
- Run it as a regular app. 

Note: SWT is not in the workspace and -Djava.library.path is NOT set.
The 4000 tests all fail because SWT is not found. The console shows all the
stack traces as expected.

Bug: we get thousands of the messages as pasted in the description (NPE).
The log file grows to megabytes and contains thousands of the following attachment.

Created an attachment (id=15624)
excerpt of the .log file

Pasting content of the previous attachment:

Some other times, doing these steps doees not generate .log file and NPE
exceptions but break hte Eclipse Preferences Dialog
Select 'Ant', 'Help' 'Java' or any other item in the Preferences dialog. The
pane on the right does not update and keep showing the Workbench preference pane.

In complement to comment 4, the NPEs then show up and the log file is filled up
when exiting Eclipse - Eclipse has to be killed.

Moving to UI. It looks like a bug in the console. It also occurs on Windows.

        at org.eclipse.ui.console.TextConsolePage$4.run(TextConsolePage.java:218)
